metadata.creator: John Berry
metadata.description: Enrique Reyes interviews Cesar Chavez about his work in the labour movement in the United States and the boycott of American grapes because of labour conditions, a list of local cultural events, A performance by social activist chilean folk group Rumbo Al Sur, Raoul Echeverria interviews Jorge Rogers about his youth rights advocacy group, comite de defensa de derechos juveniles, more music from Rumbo Al Sur
metadata.title: Programa Nosotros. Rumbo al sur
